kickstart.post:
( cd /etc/pki/tls ; \ /usr/bin/openssl req -new -nodes -config /etc/security/ca/ca.cfg \ -keyout private/localhost.key \ -subj "\ /C=&Info_CertificateCountry;/\ ST=&Info_CertificateState;/\ L=&Info_CertificateLocality;/\ O=&Info_CertificateOrganization;/\ OU=&Info_ClusterName;/\ CN=&Kickstart_PublicHostname;" \ > certs/localhost.csr ; \ chmod 0400 private/localhost.key )
( cd /etc/security/ca; \ /usr/bin/openssl x509 -req -days 2000 \ -CA ca.crt -CAkey ca.key -CAserial ca.serial \ < /etc/pki/tls/certs/localhost.csr \ > /etc/pki/tls/certs/localhost.crt ; \ chmod 0444 /etc/pki/tls/certs/localhost.crt )
